website_summaries.verdict: A classic piggy bank that's attractive and built to last with care – a piece that offers craftsmanship suitable to be handed down for generations.
pros: Made by a top name in piggy banks
We love how it is nicely crafted in glazed ceramic
Has a cute polka dot design
cons: Though the ceramic is breakable, it's durable and made to last with reasonable care

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I buy one of these as a baby gift every time. They are quite large and look gorgeous. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca g.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Seems solid/not cheap. Overall happy. Gave as gift, so can't speak to how it's used on a daily basis
customer_reviews.author: A. Englerth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for boys nursery!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson’s nursery, which is grey, navy, and white. It blended with the decor perfectly and his parents loved it too!
customer_reviews.author: Kellers

customer_reviews.title: Cute bank
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute bank and my niece loves it. The only thing I didn't like is that two of the protective covers on the feet were damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great bank for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a baby shower gift. It is pretty big. Great quality. The mom to be loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality item
customer_reviews.text: Great quality item. this is my second and both kids love them. Ceramic is very good, paint is excellent and they are standing up to abuse very well. A grest way to teach about the value of money.Iwouldnt hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It is so cute. As mentioned it is bigger than you might think.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Gaines

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with the quality and design of the piggy bank
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the quality and design of the piggy bank. It was bigger than I expected and was very happy about that. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bora

customer_reviews.title: Great growing gift for baby
customer_reviews.text: Baby gift for baby room. Was perfect. Brought one for my first grand son who is 7 and it’s full and he still loves putting money in his piggy.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley H Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Piggy for new Grandson
customer_reviews.text: A good quality item as portrayed and this is the second bank bought! Start them saving early.
customer_reviews.author: Peabo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Bank. It was a gift and the mom loved it!
customer_reviews.author: jjtilly

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is cute but the dots look very poorly painted on. Just kind of sloppy in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Symington

customer_reviews.title: Hi Quality, Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Adorable piggy bank that is well made and the perfect size for years of saving!
customer_reviews.author: Jack's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Chipped
customer_reviews.text: The bank is really cute but mine arrived with a chipped ear. I'll be returning it for a replacement. Frustrating since I needed it for a baby shower this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste B Cappiello

customer_reviews.title: Has anyone else had this problem? The bank is ...
customer_reviews.text: Has anyone else had this problem? The bank is heavy and well made. However, there are a few indentations on the porcelain that are quite obvious. One is directly in front of pig on its face. Can't decide if I should return or not but it does bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Used it to "feed the pig" at my daughter's baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fund Bank!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bank as a gift for an adult to use for “fun funds”. The grey was perfect for an adult and the design is more like sculpture then a toy. Heavy weight and good size.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Super Cute. Great Quality. Great for loose coins around the house. Large amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cutest piggy ever and color and size are perfect! 🐖🐷
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this adorable piggy bank. Bought for my grandson's 4th birthday, he loves him too. The size, and color of this little guy are even better than I expected. This is a purchase you won't regret.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

product_meta.title: Child to Cherish Large Pig White with Polka Dot Toy Bank, Grey

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars79 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
